text:
e="preserve">Ambrose "Amblin' Amby" Schindler (born April 22, 1917) is a former American collegiate football player, coach, actor and stuntsman. He was born in San Diego, California. He played college football for the University of Southern California. He was in the 1940 Rose Bowl. He went on to be the MVP in the 1940 College All-Star Game, held at Soldier Field in Chicago.
Schindler was in the "The Wizard of Oz" as a Winkie Guard and as Jack Haley's Tin Man stunt double. He also appeared in "Sailor's Lady" (1940).
